\![https://hostodo.com](https://i.ibb.co/c2Gd8x3/Screen-Shot-2020-05-06-at-7-18-23-PM.png "")

Hello all,

Hostodo is a VPS hosting company in operation since late 2014. We offer NVMe based KVM VPSs in Las Vegas (and Miami, but Miami has been out of stock for a while, we're working on it)


**Features:**  

* Fast Intel PCIe NVMe drives in RAID1
* Free DirectAdmin Standard License (Open a ticket)
* We own our IPv4 space
* We own and operate our own infrastructure
* IPv6 on all plans
* We accept Credit Card, PayPal, Cryptocurrencies (BTC, ETH, XRP, and more), and AliPay

**Looking Glasses:**
Las Vegas, NV:
http://lv.hostodo.com/


---

Las Vegas, NV
